records.description: As a Buncombe County man walked from the county courthouse to his car in the late morning Aug. 21, armed officers working with ICE pulled up in an unmarked SUV and grabbed him in the middle of a crosswalk, multiple officials confirmed to the Citizen Times. At least one officer carried a "tactical AR-15" and two wore bulletproof vests, according to the newspaper. One vest displayed “U.S. Marshals” and another said some form of “police." A photo of the interaction shows two officers in ballcaps and holstered handguns.
records.description_en: As a Buncombe County man walked from the county courthouse to his car in the late morning Aug. 21, armed officers working with ICE pulled up in an unmarked SUV and grabbed him in the middle of a crosswalk, multiple officials confirmed to the Citizen Times. At least one officer carried a "tactical AR-15" and two wore bulletproof vests, according to the newspaper. One vest displayed “U.S. Marshals” and another said some form of “police." A photo of the interaction shows two officers in ballcaps and holstered handguns.
records.description_es: Mientras un hombre del condado de Buncombe caminaba desde el juzgado del condado hacia su auto a altas horas de la mañana del 21 de agosto, oficiales armados trabajando con ICE se acercaron en una SUV sin marcar y lo agarraron en medio de un cruce peatonal, confirmaron múltiples funcionarios al Citizen Times. Al menos un oficial llevaba un "AR-15 táctico" y dos vestían chalecos antibalas, según el periódico. Uno de los chalecos mostraba "Marschalls de EE. UU." y otro tenía alguna forma de "policía". Una foto de la interacción muestra a dos oficiales con gorras y pistolas en fundas.

records.description_es: Los oficiales de la Oficina de Aduanas y Protección Fronteriza de los Estados Unidos llevaron a cabo una operación de cumplimiento dirigida en el área de Durham, Carolina del Norte, hoy, lo que resultó en la detención de varias personas, según indica el comunicado. Informes de noticias indican que 11 personas fueron detenidas. "Todos los detenidos se encuentran actualmente en un centro de detención federal a la espera de audiencias de deportación".

records.description: A worker in Morrisville who was in a car accident w ICE this morning. He's currently in the WakeMed Brier Creek Emergency Department, had a knee injury. I wasn't able to get all the details clearly, but I think he was rammed by the agents (on purpose or by accident), tried to move his car off the road, at which point they rammed him on purpose, totalled his car. He got out of the car, knee injured and "todo mareado", they pointed guns at him on the sidewalk, grabbed him and shoved him to the ground, hit his head. At that point they finally asked if he was hurt, and he said yes his knee was hurt, and he said yes, his knee was injured, and so the ambulance was called. He was at Brier Creek Hospital, and then was detained upon discharge around 2pm on 12/2. He was then held for two days at Wake County Sheriff's Office, and is being federally charged with ramming his vehicle into federal agents' vehicles (which he disputes). His next hearing is 12/10, where he will be assigned a public defender.

records.description: Family lives in Washington, NC. She went in for her interview at 9am. Had an interperter with them. "I already read over your file, i don't need you - they said to interpeter and daughter" They said they'd talk to her only. Attorney was on the call the whole time. In the middle of the interview, the ICE agents came in and arrested it. The agent that was doing the interview had said they were going to approve it but then the ICE agents interpetted to arrest us. Permanent Residency -- Work permit that was good until Nov 2030 - had just renewed it. Julie Solonan in Marlyand. She had legal parole. She had a deportation from 1998 but was never notified. 2023 was let in legally. In '98 had an attorney who made them sign things and had things sent to a PO box that she did not have access to. Attorney has already sent an emergency motion to reopen the case. She's not coming up on the ICE locator. Judy Bary (Greg Murphy) - works for her - has poltical connections - has worked for her 30 years - republican donor.

records.description:
3 autos de agentes federales los pararon, chocaron su auto, se bajaron con rifles automatics, los sacaron del auto, detuvieron a su esposo y se llevaron. A ella la esposaron pero luego la dejaron ir.  Dejaron a sus niños en la escuela, cuando iban de regreso a la casa, varias camionetas negras con vidrios polarizados los pararon, chocaron su auto en el medio de la calle, tenían armas grandísimas, los sacaron del auto y se lo llevaron al esposo. A ella la esposaron, la amenazaron con "balearla" si se resistía y luego la soltaron. Hay muchos testigos y videos que ya fueron enviados a siembra.  Nissan beige car. Have videos that already sent to Siembra./ 

Three vehicles with federal agents stopped them, rammed their car, got out with automatic rifles, pulled them out of the vehicle, detained her husband, and took him away. They handcuffed her but later let her go. They had left their children at school, and when they were heading back home, several black SUVs with tinted windows stopped them, rammed their car in the middle of the street, and were carrying very large weapons. They pulled them out of the car and took the husband away. She was handcuffed, threatened with being “shot” if she resisted, and then released. There are many witnesses and videos that have already been sent to Siembra. Beige Nissan car. Videos have already been sent to Siembra.

records.description_en: Confirmed ICE encounter by bystanders and Verifier. 3-5 vehicles with tinted windows and emergency light (Chevys and Fords) targeted a Hispanic male and female driving in their vehicle. ICE vehicle rear ended the victims vehicle while another vehicle drove around them striking them from the front. The male victim got out and was clearly injured. The ICE agents arrested him. They were heavily armed and wearing cowboy hats, ski masks and ballistics vests. A Verifier was on scene at this time. ICE left with the male victim.
records.description_es: Encuentro confirmado con ICE por parte de testigos y Verificador. 3-5 vehículos con ventanas polarizadas y luces de emergencia (Chevys y Fords) apuntaron a un hombre y una mujer hispanos que conducían en su vehículo. El vehículo de ICE chocó por detrás al vehículo de las víctimas mientras otro vehículo los rodeaba golpeándolos de frente. El hombre herido salió del vehículo. Los agentes de ICE lo arrestaron. Estaban fuertemente armados y llevaban sombreros vaqueros, pasamontañas y chalecos antibalas. En ese momento, un Verificador estaba en la escena. ICE se fue con el hombre arrestado.

records.description:
Fue a la cita de probation que va todos los meses, y se lo llevaron por detras de la puerta. Esposa estaba esperando afuéra, tenia corte a marzo 

He went to his probation appointment, which he attends every month, and they took him away through the back door. His wife was waiting outside. He had a court date in March.

records.description:
Charlotte Observer Instagram post: ICE agents told two men in Salisbury, NC, to stop recording them during a traffic stop on Monday, cellphone video posted online by the group Siembra NC shows.

Agents eventually removed the men from the car. They were not charged, Siembra spokesperson Marley Monacello said.
